full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MGRON RNAMS LA PHYI RTEN 'BUL TSUL NGO MTSAR PHO BRANG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(ZHES MGRON RNAMS LA PHYI RTEN 'DZUGS TSUL NGO MTSAR PHO BRANG ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, SNGAGS 'CHANG RNAL 'BYOR KHA CHE THOR GVOD KYI YIG CHA DANG, BLA MA BRAG SPUNGS PAS MDZAD PA'I YIG CHA GNYIS LA GZHI BYAS NAS CUNG ZAD KHA BSKANG DGOS PA RNAMS KYIS KHA BSKANGS NAS LEGS CHA THAMS CAD @009B PHYOGS GCIG TU BSDEBS TE BADZRA BGYIS PA 'DI NI, BOD SOGS KYI YUL RNAMS SU LHA CHOS PHAL CHER TSIG GI RJES SU 'BRANGS TE YUL LHA GZHI BDAG DANG, LHA BA MO PA BAR BON RNAMS CHE BTZAN DU BRTEN PA MANG DU YOD PA DE DAG MI LEGS PA TZAM DU MA ZAD, ,RANG GZHAN 'PHUR BA'I MYUR 'GRO MA MANG NA'ANG, AU RGYAN RIN PO CHES, DUS NGAN BSKAL BA'I SNYIGS MA LA, ,BKA' BZHIN MI BYED RANG BA ZO BYID, ,BAN DANG BON GYI LHA SRUNG RNAMS, ,'TSAL LA GSOL MCHOD BYED PA DANG, ,DGE SDIG 'CHOL BAR SPYOD PA'I DUS, ,MI 'DOD SNA TSOGS 'BYUNG BAR NGES, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR GYUR BAS, ,LHA RANG RANG GI RTEN 'DZUGS TSUL LA YANG LAG LEN BYED NA RUNG NGAM SNYAM MO, ,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
